sentences.en: In this video, I'm going to be sharing some tips and tricks for how to get dressed with ease and intention this autumn.
sentences.zh: 我会分享一些诀窍，教你搭配出舒适又有设计感的秋季穿搭。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɪn ðɪs ˈvɪdioʊ, aɪm ˈɡoʊɪŋ tə bi ˈʃɛrɪŋ sʌm tɪps ænd trɪks fɔr haʊ tə ɡɛt drɛst wɪð iz ænd ɪnˈtɛnʃən ðɪs ˈɔtəm/

sentences.en: And I think this is probably one of the easiest ways to incorporate your current pieces into next season's wardrobe.
sentences.zh: 这大概是最简单的方法之一，能让你把现有的衣服无缝融入到下季的穿搭。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd aɪ θɪŋk ðɪs ɪz ˈprɑbəbli wʌn əv ði ˈiziəst weɪz tə ɪnˈkɔrpəˌreɪt jʊər ˈkɜrənt ˈpisəz ˈɪntu nɛkst ˈsizənz ˈwɔrdˌroʊb/

sentences.en: It's an effortless and simple way to transition your outfits, and you can incorporate your summer colors with autumn pieces to make it feel a little bit more appropriate to this season.
sentences.zh: 这样搭配既省心又简单，你可以把夏天的配色融入秋天的单品里，让整体看起来更贴合这个季节的氛围。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɪts ən ˈɛfərtləs ænd ˈsɪmpəl weɪ tə trænˈzɪʃən jʊər ˈaʊtˌfɪts, ænd ju kæn ɪnˈkɔrpəˌreɪt jʊər ˈsʌmər ˈkʌlərz wɪð ˈɔtəm ˈpisəz tə meɪk ɪt fil ə ˈlɪtəl bɪt mɔr əˈproʊpriət tə ðɪs ˈsizən/

highlight_entries.display_text: It's an effortless and simple way to
highlight_entries.translation_zh: 这样搭配既省心又简单

sentences.en: All the pieces I'm wearing here are very timeless, so it's really easy to wear these throughout the whole year.
sentences.zh: 我现在穿的这些单品都非常经典百搭，全年都可以穿。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɔl ðə ˈpisəz aɪm ˈwɛrɪŋ hɪr ɑr ˈvɛri ˈtaɪmləs, soʊ ɪts ˈrɪli ˈizi tə wɛr ðiz θruˈaʊt ðə hoʊl jɪr/

sentences.en: And these pieces have such great longevity.
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd ðiz ˈpisəz hæv sʌʧ ɡreɪt lɑnˈdʒɛvəti/

sentences.en: And you want to make the most out of those classic staple pieces in your wardrobe.
sentences.zh: 你肯定也想把衣橱里的这些经典款最大化利用起来。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd ju wɑnt tə meɪk ðə moʊst aʊt əv ðoʊz ˈklæsɪk ˈsteɪpəl ˈpisəz ɪn jʊər ˈwɔrdˌroʊb/

sentences.en: And it's great to just throw a cardigan on top around this time of year, and I just think it makes for a really effortless, easy outfit.
sentences.zh: 像现在这个季节，在外面随手套一件开衫就很好看，很简单的穿搭。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd ɪts ɡreɪt tə ʤʌst θroʊ ə ˈkɑrdɪɡən ɑn tɑp əˈraʊnd ðɪs taɪm əv jɪr, ænd aɪ ʤʌst θɪŋk ɪt meɪks fɔr ə ˈrɪli ˈɛfərtləs, ˈizi ˈaʊtˌfɪt/
